import React,{useState,useContext } from 'react' import {Container,Col,Row,Form,FormGroup,Button} from 'reactstrap' import {Link,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import '../styles/login.css' import loginImg from '../assets/images/login.png' import userImg from '../assets/images/user.png' import {BASE_URL} from './../utils/config' import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext' const Login = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const[credentials,setCredentials] = useState({ email:undefined, password:undefined }) const handleChange = e =>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } const {dispatch}=useContext(AuthContext) const handleClick = async e =>{ dispatch({type:'LOGIN_START'}) e.preventDefault(); try { const res = await fetch (`${BASE_URL}/auth/login`,) } catch (error) { } } return

} export default Login
